duties_responsibilities.duty: Calculate heat and mass balances of plant processes.
Perform fluid mechanics calculations to size new pumps and piping and to evaluate existing systems for problem-solving and optimization.
Conduct plant and lab tests to measure the impact of process changes on plant performance.
Identify opportunities to improve plant efficiencies and prepare CAR with supportive documentation.
Perform design and cost estimates on new projects. Manage capital projects as required.
Regularly monitor plant operations to assure safety, quality, and cost controls meet expectations.
Support KPI development, measurement, communication, and continuous improvement utilizing Compass continuous improvement tools.
Perform other related duties as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering (Chemical Engineering preferred). Master's degree a plus.
